corrections.wrong: No framework exists for multi-agent confidence propagation
corrections.right: SAUP (ACL 2025) and HTC (Jan 2026) address multi-agent propagation — partial solutions exist but don't compose across organizational boundaries
corrections.source: Frontier Research Agent + Red Team Finding #4

corrections.wrong: ECE of 27.3% for consistency calibration is a universal result
corrections.right: The 27.3% ECE figure is from biomedical QA only (PMC study). Domain-specific — cross-domain generalization unverified
$67.4B figure is from AllAboutAI — single non-peer-reviewed source with no disclosed methodology. Use verified case studies (Mata v. Avianca, Air Canada) instead

corrections.wrong: The Three-Tier Architecture is implementable on Monday morning by any engineer
corrections.right: Only Tier 3 (threshold routing) is trivially implementable. Tier 1 needs 1-2 days + ML experience. Tier 2 (conformal) requires statistician. Tier 1.5 (SAUP/HTC) is research-grade only
Actual cost with Haiku pricing (~$0.80/MTok) for 3 calls × 200 tokens ≈ $0.0005 — report estimate is ~10x too high (or assumes longer prompts)

corrections.wrong: Self-consistency meta-calibration (5-prompt agreement) validates claim correctness
corrections.right: 5-prompt self-consistency is epistemically circular — validates consistency-based calibration using consistency. Agreement rates likely inflated by ~10-20%

corrections.wrong: ECE < ε is sufficient for good calibration
corrections.right: ECE is necessary but not sufficient. Requires Sharpness + Resolution. Use Brier Score for complete assessment
